title: Dermoscopy as a clinical tool for the diagnosis of demodicosis: a retrospective intrapatient case-control study
details: J Parra-Cares, R Meza-Romero, S Ibáñez, M Canales… - Archives of Dermatological …, 2024
abstract: Dermoscopy has been used for the non-invasive diagnosis of demodicosis. Several studies have evaluated the usefulness of this tool in the diagnosis, however, there are differences in the gold standard (SSSB or KOH test) and criteria of positivity used …
